room_title: Escape room "Blackbeard's Ghost" by The Game Fort Collins in Fort Collins
room_address: 925 E Harmony Rd #500, Fort Collins, CO 80525
room_description:
A fierce battle broke out between Blackbeard and the Royal. Both sides took heavy casualties, and eventually, Blackbeard was killed in battle. Blackbeard's head was cut off and his body thrown overboard where legend has that it swam around the ship several times before sinking.
It has been said by many of our players that Blackbeard still haunts the caves. You have an hour to search the maps hidden in the walls, recover the stolen gold and make it out before his ghost returns!
